snippet: Albert Brooks talks about the lengths he went to to understand his violent character in "Drive."
abstract: Albert Brooks talks about the lengths he went to to understand his violent character in "Drive."
lead_paragraph: One of the scene-stealers at the New York Film Critics Circle dinner on Monday was the best-supporting-actor winner, Albert Brooks, whose kudos began with an impromptu shout-out from Aaron Sorkin.

headline.main: Albert Brooks Finds a New Use for His Character's Backstory
